TextJPN: ＜C.古手一家の世界＞の『C6 古手夫妻怪死事件』の出現条件を教えるわね。
TextENG: I'll teach you the unlock condition for ``C6 Mysterious Death of the Furude Couple`` in the World of the Furude Family.

TextJPN: ＜C.古手一家の世界＞の『C5 三番目の「検体」』@r＜D.ダム戦争の世界＞の『D3 おやっさん』@r…以上のカケラを見た後、選択できるようになるわよ。
TextENG: ``C5 Third 'Specimen'`` in the World of the Furude Family@r``D3 The Old Guy`` in the World of the Dam War@r...After viewing the above pieces, you will be able to select this one.

TextJPN: そして、@r＜E.昭和５７年の世界＞の『E3 部活結成』@r＜M.陰謀の世界＞の『M1 赤いカプセル薬』@r…以上のカケラの出現に関わってくるわよ。
TextENG: Also, ``E3 Formation of a Club`` in the World of 1982@rand ``M1 A Red Capsule`` in the World of Conspiracy@r...These additional fragments will be involved in their unlocking.
